empDet.title: Mindtree Limited, [Bangalore, India]
empDet.longDesc: Worked as a Full stack stack developer for implementing the features of the web applications and tools

description.dec: Implemented an Admin panel using MEAN stack, meant to facilitate the admin activities of a web application. The activities involve, designing web UI, facilitating the user authentication and providing relevant web APIs on the backend. This project enables user to update the web portal in terms of recent software releases and user documentation. The project involved following activities performed by me.
bullets: Providing REST api in express to facilitate image upload using Multer.
Enabling lazy loading for the components and implementing user friendly UI implementation.
Fetching the user data from the database as required and implementing JWT authentication.

description.dec: Responsible for developing CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins â€“ Pipeline and SonarQube meant for analysis of the code quality. Written validation scripts in Nodejs for verifying the Json files

Facilitating the new features and its test suite integration with Jenkins.

description.dec: Involved in the development of Customer specific VS-code plugins using typescript and webview
bullets: Involved in implementing new features facilitating customer requirements
Understanding the workflow of the existing extensions and introduced fixes for the same

empDet.title: EFI India, [Bangalore, India]
